name: Corrupted Flesh
text: You have sickened, rotting flesh from some deformity or vestigial limb that has turned fetid and necrotic, yet refuses to heal or fall off.
benefit: You gain the stench special ability (DC 10 + 1/2 your HD + your Constitution modifier).
text_zh: 你浑身不断脱落气味逼人的死皮和脓疖，或是你身上长着多余的退化肢体一直在腐烂，无法治愈。
benefit_zh: 你获得恶臭（Stench）怪物特殊能力（DC=10+1/2你的HD+你的体质调整值）。
